subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Vincenzo Nibali took a major step toward overall victory in the Giro d’Italia after powering to his first stage win in an individual uphill time trial.
snippet: Vincenzo Nibali took a major step toward overall victory in the Giro d’Italia after powering to his first stage win in an individual uphill time trial.
